ticket.title: clear_query_cache Documentation Patch
ticket.original-body:
Attached find a small but useful documentation path. Explains how and when to use the previously-undocumented clear_query_cache method, including discussion of an edge case where direct invocation of the method would be useful.
See: http://rubyjudo.com/2007/8/9/clearing-the-rails-query-cache
And this ticket: http://dev.rubyonrails.org/ticket/9441 (The resolution of which was to determine that a doc patch is in order.)
